name: GrabLook
author: GrabLook Technology Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
-No need to Change any Code on your WordPress site, just install GrabLook Plugin and it will automatically insert code on your WordPress site.
-To Activate GrabLook Plugin, Please insert your Unique Account Id in your GrabLook Plugin Settings.
-Donot have a GrabLook Account Id, Please Register here https://grablook.com

What is GrabLook?
-GrabLook helps publishers Increase Social Sharing on their Website, which in turn Increase’s Traffic and Revenues.
-Increase Customer Engagement on your Website.
-Amplify your Content while User Shares your article (eg: Show Users, Most Shared article while sharing the article.)
-please get in touch with us at hi@grablook.com

Configuration

Enter your GrabLook Account ID in the field marked ‘GrabLook ACCOUNT ID’

Adding to your template

header code :

footer code :
sections.installation:
WordPress : Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

WordPressMu : Same as above
sections.faq:
I can’t see any code added to my header or footer when I view my page source

Your theme needs to have the header and footer actions in place before the </head> and before the </body>

If I use this plugin, do I need to enter any other code on my website?

No, just install GrabLook Plugin and activate your Plugin by Inserting your Unique GrabLook Account Id
